articles.title: Coronavirus: 19 deaths, 354 new cases in Manitoba Saturday - CTV News

articles.title: Canada surpasses 400000 coronavirus cases as infection rate accelerates - q107.com
articles.description: The country is now averaging roughly 6,000 new coronavirus cases daily — more than three times the rate seen during the first peak of the pandemic in the spring.
articles.content:
Canada surpassed 400,000 cases of the novel coronavirus Friday, as the pandemic continues to spread at a record pace across the country.
